column5: Home is located in SW San Antonio area. Shopping centers located 10 minutes away on 1604 loop. Attractions: Sea World 4 miles , Lackland AFB 5 mil, Downtown/Riverwalk 20 min. Our home is family friendly for those coming to BMT graduation, vacation or family events in San Antonio.  We take extra care to prepare our home in order to make guest feel right at home.  We want you to have a memorable stay with us. KEYLESS ENTRY
